Class LeftUI

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      LeftUI

public class LeftUI
extends greenfoot.Actor

This class is made to implement a part of the user interface which shows the amount of fuel and helat that the player has.

Version:
(2016, may)
Author:
(Alfredo Granja)
